description: THE PREPARATION OF ST. VINCENT AND THE GRENADINES  SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNICATION ON CLIMATE CHANGE.

subproject.description:
The project will contribute to the global objective of stablizing greenhouse gas concentration in the atmosphere by providing greater understanding of sources and sinks of Green House Gas..  It will also help St. Vincent and the Grenadines to better manage Green House Gas by reducing fossil fuel consumption and increasing energy efficiency.  The outputs of this project are:
Ouput 1:  An inventory of greenouse gases for the year 2000.
Output 2:  Identification of strategies and measures to abate the emission of greenhouse gases
Output 3.  An assessment of the impacts of climate change on the various economic and natural systems and relevant adaptation measures : and 
Outpout 4:  The preparation of St. Vincent and the Grenadines' Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNICATION
